thumb.title: Believe It / 初音ミク
thumb.description: Believe It過ぎゆく時間を心に刻み 未来への道を探してるさまよいながら この足で歩き続ける記憶の欠片を拾い集め 命の糸で繋ぐ誰にも言えない秘密を抱えても 明日への希望を胸に 静かに息を吸う運命というなら 受け入れよう全てを力に変えて 前に進んでいくいつか必ず光の当たる場所に 辿り着くと信じてAmidst the passing crowds, familiar scenery, unchanging days I engrave the time that has passed in my heart, searching for the path to the future I may get lost, but I walk on with these feet I gather up fragments of memories and connect them with the thread of life Happiness and sorrow, everything shapes who I am now Even though I carry a secret that I can't tell anyone, I am still strong I take a quiet breath with hope for tomorrow in my heart If you call it fate, then I will accept it, this flow called destiny I will transform all joy and pain into strength and move forward I believe that one day I will surely reach a place where the light shines I will live with the future I grasp with these hands engraved in my heartMusic,Lyric,All Sound Prog : SonataMovie : Rebel
